channel.title: Elluzion[PI]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://img130.imageshack.us/img130/7411/elluszion1.png[/img]
This is the start of a grand server, Based off [PI], It Will be hosted 24/7, I will contribute as much as i can, Including my own money, For hosting and Domain's etc, I need Programmer's that wont just sit there being bored, i need creative one's.
[IMG]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/mod_gold.gif[/img][b]Team[/b][IMG]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/mod_gold.gif[/img] Project Starter: Ryan Project Co-Starter: Moe Server-Sided Programmer's [2/3] Client-Sided Programmer [0/1] Beta-Tester's [0/20] Gfx Artist's [1/2]
[IMG]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/mod_gold.gif[/img][b]Feature's[/b][IMG]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/mod_gold.gif[/img]
[ul][*]Nearly 100% Curse's. [*]100% Godsword Special's. [*]Perfect Rushing. [*]Easy Fun training. [*]Fun Minigame's. [*]Chaotic's And Zuriel's,Statius,Vesta. [*]Dharok's,Verac,Ahrim's,Karil's,Guthan's. [*]Nearly 100% Every Skill. [*]Active and Mature Staff Member's. [*] Firemaking. [*] Woodcutting. [*] Mining. [*] Smithing.[/ul]
[IMG]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/mod_gold.gif[/img][b]What we are Aiming For[/b][IMG]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/mod_gold.gif[/img]
[ul][*]A Clean and Stable Economy. [*]New update's Everyday. [*]Fun training And PvP. [*]Active Non-Abusing StaffMember's. [*]100% Non-Buggy Server. [*]No Dupe's. [*]100% Hunter. [*]100% Rest of the Skill's.[/ul]
[IMG]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/mod_gold.gif[/img][b]Media[/b][IMG]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/mod_gold.gif[/img] Curse's [URL=http://img825.imageshack.us/i/cursee.gif/][IMG]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/9286/cursee.gif[/img][/URL]
Godsword Special's [URL=http://img198.imageshack.us/i/rofln.gif/][IMG]http://img198.imageshack.us/img198/7389/rofln.gif[/img][/URL]
Ancient's [URL=http://img412.imageshack.us/i/pwwwwwww.gif/][IMG]http://img412.imageshack.us/img412/3017/pwwwwwww.gif[/img][/URL]
Vengeance [URL=http://img130.imageshack.us/i/pefkkfff.gif/][IMG]http://img130.imageshack.us/img130/1567/pefkkfff.gif[/img][/URL]
[IMG]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/mod_gold.gif[/img][b]Application Format.[/b][IMG]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/mod_gold.gif[/img]
[CODE]Name Contact info:
Age:
Hours of day your available:
Location:
Previous work:
Where can i find your previous Work:
Any other Information: [/CODE]
[IMG]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/mod_gold.gif[/img][b]Supporter's[/b][IMG]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/mod_gold.gif[/img]
Moe Myself Andrew
Thank You For Reading.
[/CENTER]

item.title: Elluzion[PI]
item.dc:creator: @GkCha0z GkCha0z
item.description:
@GkCha0z wrote:

[CENTER]

This is the start of a grand server, Based off [PI], It Will be hosted 24/7,
I will contribute as much as i can, Including my own money,
For hosting and Domain’s etc, I need Programmer’s that wont just sit there being bored,
i need creative one’s.

Team
Project Starter: Ryan
Project Co-Starter: Moe
Server-Sided Programmer’s [2/3]
Client-Sided Programmer [0/1]
Beta-Tester’s [0/20]
Gfx Artist’s [1/2]

Feature’s

[ul][]Nearly 100% Curse’s.
[]100% Godsword Special’s.
[]Perfect Rushing.
[]Easy Fun training.
[]Fun Minigame’s.
[]Chaotic’s And Zuriel’s,Statius,Vesta.
[]Dharok’s,Verac,Ahrim’s,Karil’s,Guthan’s.
[]Nearly 100% Every Skill.
[]Active and Mature Staff Member’s.
[] Firemaking.
[] Woodcutting.
[] Mining.
[*] Smithing.[/ul]

What we are Aiming For

[ul][]A Clean and Stable Economy.
[]New update’s Everyday.
[]Fun training And PvP.
[]Active Non-Abusing StaffMember’s.
[]100% Non-Buggy Server.
[]No Dupe’s.
[]100% Hunter.
[]100% Rest of the Skill’s.[/ul]

Media
Curse’s

Godsword Special’s

Ancient’s

Vengeance

Application Format.

Contact info:
